subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] New Member...Need Advice
author: Zack Widup
full_text:
Hi Matt,

You can get a Radio Shack 12-469 for $25 and hack it to do the scanning.

Zack

On Thu, 29 May 2008, Matt Schulz wrote:

> Hey all,
> I have been interested in EVP since my aunt introduced me to it years
> ago.  Can anyone link the costs or materials one needs to build or
> purchase a device?
> Thanks,
> Matt
>
